name: Color Patterns
description:
Color Patterns is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the classic tabletop game of dominoes.

- Mouse-only controls;
- Designed for puzzle lovers;
- Minimalist design. No score, timer or pressure;
- Find the red, green, blue and yellow color patterns of the pieces;
- Solve 40 carefully crafted challenging levels;

A challenging puzzle game that requires attention. With carefully crafted levels, the challenge is to find the correct patterns on the board. When in the correct position and rotation, a star is highlighted in the center of each piece. Some pieces can work in more than one position.

Can you find the correct pattern that will solve each puzzle? Try it out and show that you are a puzzle expert.
